title: Straw Poll Results, Season Conditioning
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon to recap Bontemps’ straw poll, Steph Curry’s dominance to start the season, Luka’s comments on his conditioning and what to expect from the Nets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
